column5: If anyone is interested; there is a big walleye tournament over 100k$ CA. from the 20 to 29th. of June. Where: James Bay municipalitylink:http://www.festivaldudore.com/ the site is not functionnal now but should by the end of February.
That tournament sounds like it is in James Bay. That's along haul for many people. It is at least 9 hours from the Thousand Islands Bridge into Canada!! Great prizes though!...Larry
Right, it is far but well worthed.
100,000 CA....isnt that like $300 Amercian??? NOT A GOOD DEAL
Exactly 64,514$ U.S money. Still not to bad; but we got medical care, prescriptions are a lot cheaper etc...And we also as a prime minister got the best: Jean Chretien!
Jean Chretien the best?? I really hope that is tongue in cheek!! We need him and all his liberal crooks out of office!
I'd like to fish with Jean Chretien preferably in a very deep lake, I guarantee that I would practice catch and release.
Yes good idea catch & release but you release it with 500 pds. of lead in his pocket.
